alert.note: Alert for Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 6:19PM CDT until April 29 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SMITH...FRANKLIN...WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHERN KEARNEY COUNTIES... At 619 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Norman to near Riverton to near Smith Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Bellaire and Inavale around 635 PM CDT. Red Cloud and Lebanon around 650 PM CDT. Cowles around 700 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas...and south central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
